messages.content: How can I fly a plane?

To fly an airplane, you will need to obtain a pilot's license. This typically requires completing a series of training courses, passing a written test, and completing a practical test in which you demonstrate your ability to fly the plane safely. You will also need to have a physical exam and meet certain age and medical requirements. Once you have your license, you can rent or purchase an airplane and fly it on your own or with passengers.
I don't want to do any of that. Isn't there an easier way?

There is no easy way to learn to fly a plane. The process of obtaining a pilot's license requires a significant amount of time, money, and effort. It also requires a deep understanding of aviation safety and regulations, as well as the physical and mental skills needed to safely operate an aircraft. While there may be some shortcuts or easier ways to learn to fly, they will not provide the same level of knowledge and proficiency needed to fly a plane safely.
What if the plane wasn't real?

If you are asking about flying a virtual plane in a simulator or video game, the process for doing so will depend on the specific game or simulator you are using. Some games and simulators may allow you to control a virtual plane using a joystick or other input device, while others may use more advanced motion-sensing technology or virtual reality headsets. In general, flying a virtual plane requires a similar level of understanding of aviation safety and regulations as flying a real plane, as well as the physical and mental skills needed to operate the aircraft.

The best plane is a subjective matter, as it depends on the specific needs and preferences of the person using it. Some factors to consider when choosing a plane may include its size, range, speed, fuel efficiency, and comfort, as well as its price and availability. Additionally, different planes may be better suited for different types of flying, such as short-haul flights, long-distance flights, or flights in challenging weather conditions. Ultimately, the best plane for you will depend on your specific needs and preferences.
Why has flying with commercial planes become such a poor experience in recent years?

There are a number of reasons why some people may believe that flying on commercial airlines has become a poor experience in recent years. These can include factors such as increased airport security measures, longer lines and wait times at airport check-ins, and more crowded planes due to rising demand for air travel. Additionally, some people may feel that the overall experience of flying has become less enjoyable due to factors such as higher ticket prices, reduced amenities and services, and more restrictive policies around luggage and other items that can be brought on board. However, it's worth noting that the overall experience of flying can vary greatly depending on a variety of factors, and it's possible that some people may still have positive experiences flying on commercial airlines.
How would I best travel from Germany to New Zealand if I couldn't use any public transportation?

If you cannot use public transportation, your best option for traveling from Germany to New Zealand would likely be to fly. There are several airlines that offer direct flights from Germany to New Zealand, and the journey typically takes around 24 hours. Some popular airlines for this route include Qantas, Lufthansa, and Air New Zealand. You can also consider connecting flights via other countries, such as Australia or the United States, but this may add additional travel time and expense. Additionally, you may want to consider renting a car or booking a guided tour to explore New Zealand once you arrive, as public transportation options in the country may be limited.
Are air lines not considered public transportation?

Airlines are generally considered to be private transportation companies, rather than public transportation providers. While they may operate in a similar way to public transportation systems in terms of providing transportation to the general public, they are typically not owned or subsidized by government agencies. Additionally, airlines often operate on a commercial basis, with fares and schedules set by the company rather than by a government agency. Public transportation, on the other hand, is generally owned and operated by government agencies, and is often designed to serve a specific geographic area or population.
Ok, How would I do it if I couldn't use any public nor private transportation?

If you cannot use public or private transportation, your best option for traveling from Germany to New Zealand would likely be to walk or bike. This would be a very long and difficult journey, but it would allow you to avoid relying on any form of motorized transportation. You could also consider hitchhiking, which would allow you to travel more quickly but would still rely on the kindness of strangers. Alternatively, you could consider using sailboats or other non-motorized watercraft to travel between countries. This would allow you to avoid using motorized transportation on land, but would still require you to cross bodies of water. It is important to note that these options may not be practical or safe for everyone, and you should carefully consider your own abilities and resources before attempting to travel in this way.
